name: Spa Day Makeover – Make-up, Hair, & Fashion Dress Me Up
name_original: Spa Day Makeover – Make-up, Hair, & Fashion Dress Me Up
description:
Finally an app that every girl will enjoy!
This game offers the best of both worlds not only does it offer spa and makeover services this app takes it one step further and includes an option to add fashion accessories.

Sit back and relax with a Spa Treatment and then get in touch with your inner "Fashionista" complete your look and have fun!

*******************************
= FREE APP TODAY
******************************

Check out the screenshots and see for yourself, you won't be disappointed!
